title: Fatal Shooting of Renee Good - Character Assassination Without Investigation
summary: 37-year-old U.S. citizen and mother of three fatally shot by ICE. Within hours, DHS and Trump labeled her a 'domestic terrorist' before any investigation. Video evidence contradicted government claims.
keyFacts: Renee Nicole Good, 37-year-old U.S. citizen and mother of three, fatally shot by ICE agent in Minneapolis
Within hours, DHS Secretary Kristi Noem labeled Good's actions 'an act of domestic terrorism' before any investigation
Trump falsely claimed Good 'violently, willfully, and viciously ran over the ICE Officer'
47-second video shows Good's car turning away from agent just over one second before first shot
Video shows agent able to walk away without assistance, contradicting claim she ran him over
Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey: 'Having seen the video myself, I want to tell everybody directly that is bullshit'
FBI revoked Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension's access to evidence
Part of pattern: At least 16 ICE shooting incidents since January 2025, 4 deaths
Good's killing was the 9th time ICE agents had opened fire since September 2025
